select:
(:action select_paper
    :parameters (?p - player ?paper - paper)
    :precondition (and (inventory ?p ?paper))
    :effect (selected ?paper)
)

(:action find_wreath_base
    :parameters (?p - player ?wreath_base - wreath_base)
    :precondition (inventory ?p ?wreath_base)
    :effect (selected ?wreath_base)
)
make:
(:action make_pinwheels
    :parameters (?p - player ?paper - paper ?pinwheel - pinwheel)
    :precondition (and (selected ?paper) (inventory ?p ?paper))
    :effect (and (inventory ?p ?pinwheel) (not (inventory ?p ?paper)))
)

(:action assemble_pinwheels
    :parameters (?p - player ?pinwheel - pinwheel ?wreath_base - wreath_base)
    :precondition (and (inventory ?p ?pinwheel) (selected ?wreath_base))
    :effect (and (assembled ?wreath_base ?pinwheel) (not (inventory ?p ?pinwheel)))
)
